@Section

Package tv

Classes specific to television, television hardware, EPGs, video recording, etc... 
<dependency>
  <groupId>ball</groupId>
  <artifactId>tv</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

Spring Boot Artifacts

application.properties

# $Id: application.properties 6989 2020-11-16 22:24:18Z ball $

application.name: tv
application.brand: tv
application.home: ${user.home}/.tv

tuner.home: ${application.home}/tuner

epg.home: ${application.home}/epg
spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto: update
spring.jpa.hibernate.naming.implicit-strategy: default
spring.jpa.hibernate.naming.physical-strategy:\
  org.hibernate.boot.model.naming.PhysicalNamingStrategyStandardImpl
spring.jpa.open-in-view: true
spring.jpa.format-sql: true
spring.jpa.show-sql: false
spring.datasource.driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
spring.datasource.url:\
  jdbc:mysql://localhost:${mysqld.port}/epg\
  ?serverTimezone=UTC&createDatabaseIfNotExist=true
spring.datasource.username: root

spring.main.banner-mode: OFF
spring.main.headless: false
spring.main.log-startup-info: false

spring.output.ansi.enabled: NEVER

spring.task.scheduling.pool.size: 4

logging.file.path: ${application.home}/log
logging.logback.rollingpolicy.max-file-size: 256KB
logging.logback.rollingpolicy.max-history: 8

mysqld.home: ${application.home}/mysql
mysqld.port: 33061

management.server.port: 8081
management.endpoints.web.exposure.include: *
management.endpoints.enabled-by-default: true
management.endpoint.shutdown.enabled: true
#management.security.enabled: false
